name: red-flute
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Cures attraction.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A red flute made from blown glass. Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out of infatuation.
flavor_text.platinum: A red flute made from blown glass. Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out of infatuation.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A red flute made from blown glass. Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out of infatuation.
